ComicInfo.Summary:
Thoughts and memories are shared about the mysterious and powerful Kaiju Queen. Where did she come from? What's her plan? Morning and Xula remember the past as they await Janey's awakening.
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from series creator Dan Mendoza (DOLLFACE)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Celor | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Herman | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Andrew Herman | 6 |
